meta.name: description
meta.value: Asking the user to select from a list of options.

parameter.name: customIntroductionPrompt
parameter.description: The custom prompt provided by the app, e.g. You have 7 items

parameter.name: customSelectionPrompt
parameter.description: The custom prompt provided by the app, e.g. Which one?

parameter.name: localizedAppName
parameter.description: The localized name of the app
